dcterms:creator: A. Geiger
P. Lenz
R. Urtasun
dcterms:description: The KITTI dataset provides 3D information in the form of stereo images and LIDAR point clouds, specifically designed for object detection tasks including cars, pedestrians, and bicyclists. It contains about 8000 images annotated based on occlusion and truncation of the objects.
dcterms:title: KITTI

dcterms:creator: X. Chen
K. Kundu
Z. Zhang
H. Ma
S. Fidler
R. Urtasun
dcterms:description: Mono3D is a method that uses 2D images to identify the pose of objects, aiming to detect objects as 3D bounding boxes. It is built around a version of R-CNN.
dcterms:title: Mono3D

dcterms:creator: X. Chen
K. Kundu
Y. Zhu
A. Berneshawi
H. Ma
S. Fidler
R. Urtasun
dcterms:description: 3D Object Proposals is a dataset designed for accurate object class detection, leveraging both 2D and 3D data to enhance detection accuracy.
dcterms:title: 3D Object Proposals

dcterms:creator: Y. Xiang
W. Choi
Y. Lin
S. Savarese
dcterms:description: 3DVP is a dataset that focuses on data-driven 3D voxel patterns for object category recognition, enhancing the understanding of object categories in 3D space.
dcterms:title: 3DVP

dcterms:creator: J. Deng
W. Dong
R. Socher
L.-J. Li
K. Li
L. Fei-Fei
dcterms:description: ImageNet is a large-scale hierarchical image database that serves as a benchmark for various image classification tasks.
dcterms:title: ImageNet

dcterms:creator: M. Everingham
L. V. Gool
C. K. I. Williams
J. Winn
A. Zisserman
dcterms:description: PASCAL is a dataset that provides a benchmark for visual object classes, facilitating the evaluation of object detection algorithms.
dcterms:title: PASCAL
